radiographic_examinations.findings: Centrilobular emphysematous changes at the lung bases, severe involving the lingula. Dependent atelectasis is subsegmental. No pleural or pericardial effusion. Small hiatus hernia. Liver enhances homogeneously without concerning focal lesion, no intrahepatic biliary ductal dilation. Gallbladder wall edema versus pericholecystic fluid with multiple large gallstones. Distended gallbladder. Pancreas enhances homogeneously with no peripancreatic stranding or ductal dilation. Tiny hypodensity in medial spleen, otherwise unremarkable spleen. Normal adrenal glands. Circumscribed hypodensities in bilateral renal cortices compatible with simple renal cysts. No hydronephrosis. Unremarkable stomach and duodenum, normal small bowel and colon. Mild aortic calcification, no mesenteric or retroperitoneal lymphadenopathy. No free intraperitoneal air or fluid. Unremarkable pelvic organs with bilateral inguinal herniorrhaphy changes. No concerning soft tissue abnormalities, minimal L1-2 retrolisthesis.
